input.sentences: hank 's fifth birthday was celebrated at the location stadium .
he was so excited to be seeing such a large stadium without any people around .
he played ball with his sister [female] .
they met the redsox mascot and got to take pictures with him .
they finished off their day with an ice cream sundae and a soda .
output.sentences: Hank took his little boy to the stadium and they visited the location he liked best.
His son was very excited to see the people.
At the next visit, Hank brought his little girl because girls played sports as well as boys.
They all met the redsox mascot that time and took some great pictures.
The day could not be more perfect and was capped off with a soda and ice for dad and a sundae for each of the kids.
